short_summary: Advance Contract Award Notice for Chemical Management Software to provide management resources
description: The software will be cloud-based and used by the Department of Natural Resources Canada
full_summary:
=================
### Natural Resources Canada Chemical Management Software as a Service

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS3787655034-Doc3795958350
* **Amendment Number:** 0
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3787655034
* **Publication Date:** December 20, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** January 11, 2023, 14:00 EST
* **Amendment Date:** December 20, 2022

#### Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan), is soliciting proposals for a Cloud-based Software as a Service (SaaS) for Chemical Management. The selected supplier will provide a commercial off-the-shelf software solution with the capability to manage chemical data.

#### Eligibility

This tender is open to all suppliers that meet the eligibility criteria, subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) or the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

#### Key Information

* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **End-User Entities:** Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)
* **Address:** 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E4, Canada
* **Contact:** Katie Jones, (SPAC/PSPC), katie.jones@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Submission Requirements

Specifications and supporting documentation must be submitted electronically by January 11, 2023, 14:00 EST. Bids received after this time will be considered non-responsive.

#### Documentation

The complete solicitation package can be found on Ariba Discovery (http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14930461?extsite=MTQ5MzA0NjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
